resources.string: User move must be a letter.
The letters %1$s cannot form a word. The computer was going for %2$s.
Auxiliart cannot form a word. The computer was going for auxiliary.
User move must be only one letter

Each player (you vs. your infinitely smarter and more superior cell phone) takes turns giving letters to form a word while avoiding being the last person to complete the word. Say the letter sequence "Ghos" has been made. (Swipe Right)
If it is your turn, playing a T would cause you to lose because that forms the complete word Ghost.
On the other hand, you cannot play letters that make it impossible for the word to continue playing. Playing an X would cause you to lose too.
Force the computer to play a letter that completes a word to win. Remember that words must be three letters or more.
